page.title: 04 GREEN FARM, cont.
page.content: for winter feed.Mr.Childs was born locally and moved to the farm with his parents when aged 2.He and his son are now in partnership.The population of Rockhampton is over 100 and the village has many social activities.There is Mothers Union, Youth Club, Bingo. The cricket team plays on the village green outside the farm and there is an annual summer fete here as well.The Childs have a Guy Fawkes bonfire every year which villagers and outsiders attend. The main local schools are Castle, St.Mary's and Manor Brook.The community is not increasing because of the high price of property and the difficulty to obtain planning permission.Local property prices are high because professional people from Bristol are commuting to work while locals have been forced to buy cheaper property on Thornbury housing estates.
